info.description:
This is the official Client API To interact with National Service Alliance (NSA)

# Dates
All dates are in the ISO 8601 format - YYYY-MM-DD - ex. 2021-12-31

See this article for more information: [ISO 8601 article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601)

# Authenication
Authenication is handled via basic authentication. 

Dev and Production credentials will be provided during the implimentation process

See this article for more information: [basic auth article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_access_authentication)
info.title: NSA Client API

post.summary: Confirms in NSA has coverage for provided parameters

example.errorMessage: You are not authorized. Please validate your authentication details.
Unexpected server error

post.summary: Provides availability by NSA based on provided parameters

200.description:
Successful request. You will get one of two responses:
1) an array of dates with availability
2) an empty array signifiying that there is no availability

example.errorMessage: You are not authorized. Please validate your authentication details.
Unexpected server error

post.summary: Provides availability by NSA based on provided parameters and associated COD Cost

post.description:
action values:
  
  * approve
  * partiallyApproved
  * estDeclined
  * rejectWithResubmit
  * partsUnAvail
  * estimateHold

partialApproval.description: Pass in only the part lines that are being approved

get.summary: Provides status of dispatch by dispatchNumber or case number in the url

serialNumber.description: Populating serialNumber is optional. If present, it will allow for better servicer selection. We attempt to reassign the same unit to the same servicer that previously serviced it, if possible.

slots.description: Slots are in the following format: HHMM-HHMM. To provide the time slot of 1:00pm to 1:30 pm you would received 1300-1330

caseNumber.description: This is the clients unique case number

scheduleDate.description: If left blank, it will be booked without a schedule date

preAuthorizationLimit.description: Amount that is pre-approved for the repair (parts and labor) before requiring an estimate

limitOfLiabilityRemaining.description: Amount of the limit of liability that is remaining on the contract.

limitOfLiabilityTotal.description: Amount of the limit of liability that began on the on the contract.

deductibleAmount.description: Some cirumstances require the consumer to pay a trip/deductible/service call fee directly to the service provider. That amount would be included here.

planCode.description: For contact work, the consumer is usually part of a specific plan that comes with certain terms and conditions

relationshipCode.description: Allows NSA to associate this repair to an arbitrary group such as a source system or billing group.

authorizationNumber.description: Some clients require a special authorization number to be provided at billing time. Please provide if required.

suspectedRecall.description: If there is concern that this dispatch should be covered under the workmanship guarantee

exclusions.description: Delimited list of things not covered by the contract

noPartsNeeded.description: Used to indicate that there are not parts required for this repair and notification of the dispatch should not be delayed

isUrgent.description: Is urgent if it is one of the following: extreme heat, extreme cold, flooding, medical emergency, no running water, no toilet access. If it is marked as urgent, an urgent reason must be provided

urgentReason.description: this field is required if isUrgent=true

example.specialInstruction: please knock instead of ringing door bell

customerNumber.description: Some clients would like to have the customer identifier provided in reports. Please provide here if you would like to report on it later.

serialNumber.description: If unknown, please use value VERIFY_SERIAL

modelNumber.description: If unknown, please use value VERIFY_MODEL

brand.description: Brand of part manufacturer not the brand of the unit. Sometimes they are the same and sometimes they are different.
